Hero.title: Arab Union for Small Enterprises
Hero.subtitle: We empower small businesses to thrive and grow in the Arab world.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To create a thriving and supportive environment for small enterprises in Arab countries, contributing to sustainable economic development.

message.title: Our Mission
message.content: To empower small enterprises through financial and technical support, enhance communication between entrepreneurs and investors, and provide training and funding opportunities to foster their growth.

content.2: Provide financial and managerial consultations to small business owners.
content.4: Support policies that favor small enterprises.
content.5: Establish strategic partnerships to enhance the business environment.

content.1: Collaboration: Provide a space for small enterprises to communicate and share experiences.
content.2: Mutual Support: Offer a system for contributions and donations to support projects.
content.3: Innovation: Develop a modern digital platform with the integration of artificial intelligence technologies.

content.name: Mohamed Al Arabi
content.quote: The Union helped develop my idea and turn it into a successful project.

content.name: Sarah Al Arabi
content.quote: The Union provides the necessary financial and technical support for the success of small businesses.

content.name: Ahmed Al Arabi
content.quote: The Union offers an encouraging environment for small businesses.

download.title: Download Our App Now
download.content: Discover the benefits of our app designed specifically to meet your daily needs.

LoginPage.title: Enter your credentials to access your account
LoginPage.register: Don't have an account? Register Now
LoginPage.email_message: Please enter a valid email address.
LoginPage.password_message_1: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
LoginPage.password_message_2: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number.
LoginPage.toast_error: Login Error. Please check your email and password.

step1.title: Select Your Role
step1.subtitle: Choose the role that suits you.
step1.error: Please select at least one role.

step2.title: User Information
step2.subtitle: Please enter your details carefully.
step2.cinplaceholder: Enter your CIN or passport number
step2.cindescription: Please provide your National Identity Number (CIN) or Passport Number for verification.
step2.documenttitle: Click to upload or drag and drop
step2.documentsubtitle: PDF, DOC, DOCX, or image up to 2MB
step2.documentdescription: Please upload an official document proving that your small business or startup is legitimate. This may include a company registration certificate, tax identification number, or any relevant legal document.

step3.title: Terms and Confirmation
step3.subtitle: Read the terms and confirm.
step3.term1content: By submitting this form, you agree to the collection, processing, and storage of your personal information, including but not limited to your name, email address, national ID/passport number, and company details. This information will be used solely for identification, verification, and communication purposes.
step3.term2content: We value your privacy. Any personal data submitted will be stored securely and will not be shared with third parties without your explicit consent, except as required by law or regulatory authorities.
step3.checkbox: I agree to the terms and conditions

step4.title: Thank You for Registering
step4.subtitle1: Your application has been successfully submitted.
step4.subtitle2: We will review your application and contact you as soon as possible.
step4.subsubtitle1: Check your email for updates on your application status.
step4.subsubtitle2: If you have any inquiries, please contact us at
